actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations for the U.S. Information Agency.
short_title: United States Information Agency Appropriations Authorization Act

summary.text: United States Information Agency Appropriations Authorization Act - Authorizes the appropriation of funds for the United States Information Agency for fiscal year 1976, to carry out international informational activities and programs under specified Federal Acts. Provides $257,692,000 for salaries and expenses; $6,187,000 for "Special International Exhibitions"; $10,135,000 for acquisition and construction of radio facilities; and such additional amounts as necessary for increases in salary and employee benefits. Authorizes necessary appropriations for the USIA for fiscal year 1977 to carry out the above provisions.

titles.title: United States Information Agency Appropriations Authorization Act
A bill to authorize appropriations for the U.S. Information Agency.
